name: Brighter Day (itch) (ryannowen, AddieMagi)
description:
Brighter day is a game about how doing the simple things can bring life to your day, it involves simple clicks and a few puzzles to solve.

This was made for the internal Double Eleven 2020 Game jam, using the theme "Mind" with partners from MSMD.

Best played in fullscreen mode

Please take care of yourself and know help is always available <3.

Made by:
Ryan Robson (Ryannowen)

Adelaide da Cunha (AddieMagi)

Music Credit: https://www.bensound.com/
